thread.title: JAMF Software Announces Same-Day Support for OS X El Capitan
thread.title_full: JAMF Software Announces Same-Day Support for OS X El Capitan

author: admin
title: JAMF Software Announces Same-Day Support for OS X El Capitan
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 11:24 AM   JAMF Software 
MINNEAPOLIS, MN -- (Marketwired) -- 09/30/15 -- JAMF Software , the leader in Apple device management, today announced same-day support for OS X El Capitan with Casper Suite 9.81. The release continues JAMF's long-standing commitment of providing organizations with the tools they need to take advantage of new Apple technology. 
As Apple technology continues to evolve, IT knows that operating system updates are always right around the corner. Yet while they can't prevent users from upgrading their devices, IT administrations are still responsible for maintaining security controls and accurate systems inventory of their organization's devices. 
For more than 13 years, thousands of organizations worldwide have relied on the experts at JAMF Software to constantly monitor Apple's newest capabilities and quickly enable them for easy use as soon as possible -- including iOS 9 and now OS X El Capitan. 
Today's Casper release enables IT administrators to manage migration to OS X El Capitan across any organization with more control and less risk through powerful inventory, deployment and security features. 
The new Casper Suite offers the following: Accurate inventory of all managed Macs through the update to OS X El Capitan Enrollment of new OS X El Capitan Macs through Apple's Device Enrollment Program (DEP), imaging or thin-imaging processes Enhancements to the DEP workflow, including the ability to simplify the OS X Setup Assistant, and extensions of user-based deployment options Deployment of applications purchased through the Volume Purchase Program without needing an Apple ID 
Available immediately 
Casper Suite with OS X El Capitan support is available as a free upgrade for all customers with up-to-date support and license agreements. Prospective customers interested in purchasing the Casper Suite may contact JAMF Software to receive additional information about evaluating the product in their organization. 
For additional information about Casper Suite, please visit: http://bit.ly/1JaNG2B 
Since 2002, JAMF Software has been helping users take advantage of the one-of-a-kind Apple ecosystem. JAMF is committed to enabling full use of the Apple platform for consumers, small businesses or large organizations, via behind-the-scenes management software like the Casper Suite and Bushel, plus the 20,000+ member JAMF Nation community . Today, more than 5,500 global customers rely on JAMF to manage nearly 5 million Apple devices. 
Comment on the News "JAMF Software is committed to providing our customers with same-day support for Apple's major releases, including iOS 9 which released earlier this month and OS X El Capitan today," said Dean Hager, CEO of JAMF Software. "As Apple evolves, so does the Casper Suite. The result is that schools and businesses are armed with the tools they need in order to succeed with the Apple platform." 
About JAMF Software Since 2002, JAMF Software -- and our Casper Suite solution -- has made it easy for businesses, schools and other enterprises to unleash the power of Apple devices in their organizations. 
Find out why more than 5,500 businesses and schools rely on JAMF Software to manage nearly 5,000,000 devices across the globe at http://www.jamfsoftware.com . Contact:
